ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISNEW(), ISBLANK(Inquiry__c), ISBLANK(Conveyance__c), ISBLANK(Listing__c), ISBLANK(Closing__c), ISBLANK( Property_Valuation__c ), ISBLANK( Offer__c ), ISBLANK( Contact__c )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Please fill in the required fields: Inquiry, Conveyance, Listing, Closing, Property Valuation or Offer. at least one field must be Required for Creating AML."
